tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_research_articles (
  article_id BIGINT,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legal_research_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    keywords VARCHAR(255),
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legal_publications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    publication_type VARCHAR(50),
    publication_date DATE,
    publisher VARCHAR(100),
    language VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE authors (
    author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    affiliation VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE publication_authors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_id INT,
    publication_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES legal_research_articles(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES publications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE article_citations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT,
    citation_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES legal_research_articles(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (citation_id) REFERENCES legal_research_articles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE article_categories (
    article_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (article_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id)
);
